doc.after: In November 1944, with the Soviet Red Army approaching through Poland, Himmler ordered gassing operations to cease across the Reich. Crematoria II, III, and IV were dismantled, while Crematorium I was transformed into an air raid shelter. The Sonderkommando were ordered to remove other evidence of the killings, including the mass graves.[60] The SS destroyed written records, and in the final week before the camp's liberation, burned or demolished many of its buildings.[61]
